name: MageSwap (aplovestudio)
description:
MageSwap is a two-player fighting game with bullet hell mechanics, where one player attacks and the other dodges. After the attacker runs out of mana by casting spells, the players switch places. 

This game was originally created as a submission to the Kennesaw State University Fall Jam 2019, and was tied for third place! The current version has a lot more features than the original jam version, which includes updated graphics, new characters, new spells, and a new single player mode.

Follow me on Twitter for more updates!

---------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: This game was inspired by the hit indie classic Undertale by Toby Fox. As a joke, I added a character from Undertale (Sans) as a playable character. I do not own Sans or any content related to Undertale.
